sizeWholeTumour.description: If the size (in mm) of the whole tumour is specified in the report, assign the value to this variable. Otherwise, assign null. Note: ignore sizes of individual foci; only report the size of the whole tumour, if reported. Otherwise, assign null.

sizeDcisOnly.description: If the size (in mm) of the ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) component of the tumour is specified in the report, assign the value to this variable. Otherwise, assign null.

sizeInvasiveTumour.description: If the size (in mm) of the invasive tumour component of the tumour is specified in the report, assign the value to this variable. Otherwise, assign null.
